sourcesContent:
"use client"; import React from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; function Sidebar() { return (
`nav-link bg-white rounded-end py-2 px-3 mb-2 ${isActive ? 'bg bg-primary text-white' : 'bg-white'}` } > Dashboard `nav-link bg-white rounded-end py-2 px-3 mb-2 ${isActive ? 'active-link' : ''}` } > Status Pendaftaran `nav-link bg-white rounded-end py-2 px-3 mb-2 ${isActive ? 'active-link' : ''}` } > Dokumen `nav-link bg-white rounded-end py-2 px-3 mb-2 ${isActive ? 'active-link' : ''}` } > Pendaftaran Beasiswa `nav-link bg-white rounded-end py-2 px-3 mb-2 ${isActive ? 'active-link' : ''}` } > Profil `nav-link bg-white rounded-end py-2 px-3 mb-2 ${isActive ? 'active-link' : ''}` } > Change Password `btn btn-danger rounded-end py-2 px-4 mt-5 ${isActive ? 'active-link' : ''}` } > Logout
); } export default Sidebar;
